entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Winter Storm Has Ended And Cold Is On The Way... The series of winter storms that impacted the Eastern Interior of Alaska since Christmas have now ended. Fairbanks received over 23 inches of snow since Christmas, with over 3 tenths of an inch of ice accumulation, along with significant sleet and rain.
